name: The Cursed Cursor
description:
You've made some bad choices as a cursor and are cursed to eternal damnation. Fight your way through short procedurally generated levels while facing off against demonic cursors.

CONTROLS:

MOUSE : Used to control the cursor (makes sense)

LEFT-CLICK: Used to shoot those demon cursors.

SPACE: Squeeze yourself a bit to fit through tighter gaps!

Thanks for checking out my first solo jam, enjoy!

Great tunes sourced from Freesound.org user: Migfus20
